resources.string: S.R.S Public School was established by the SR education society in 1999, to provide high caliber education, on CBSE/NCERT syllabi guidelines, comparable with the best public school in the country in the course of its relatively brief history the school has grow strength to strength. Starting with primary classes only, S.R.S. in now a full fledge senior secondary school. Thanks to the hard work and determination of the society and the school staff, as well as the precious support of parents and well-wishers, there has been no stopping S.R.S today, it is happily running to full capacity, at full steam! And allegiant new building with all modern amenities has come up to house one branch of our progressive school.
In short, a student at S.R.S. Public School develops a multifaceted personality that make him/her ready face the challenges of life and future.
